WelcomeCharacter: Hi, ~user~, would you like to watch again the tutorial?
butcher: Hey! We have the best meat in the city, come take a look!

I've got the freshest meats!
This pork is so fresh that it's still singing Hakuna Matata!
ortolan: EGGPLANT! LETTUCE! TOMATOES! WE HAVE THE BEST VEGETABLES!
